name: ziplineGun
description:
My submission for the first edition of the Mix and Game Jam

It's a simple game mechanic recreation, not an entire game, I tried to reproduce in 2d the ApexLegend zipline gun of the character "pathfinder".

This is my first gameJam, it's a little bit buggy, I did not have time to do everything I wanted, but It was a cool first experience.

You can see my code on github:
https://github.com/zer0nim/mixAndGameJam
